summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ChatMatchCardWrapper fix - match card sharing now uses consistent MatchCard design between main page and chat messages
passed_tests: Backend API health check and root endpoint
Friends invite match endpoint (proper 403 response for non-friends)
Messages page loads correctly with authentication
Messages page properly redirects to login when not authenticated
ChatMatchCardWrapper renders shared match cards with data-testid='shared-match-card'
Match shares display consistent MatchCard design (not chat bubble styling)
Match cards in chat show team crests, voting buttons, match metadata, and advanced options
Authentication flow works correctly with session management
WebSocket connections established for chat, notifications, and friends
